mean_cn: n. 天才，天资，天赋，才华
mean_en: people who have very great intelligence or ability; great intelligence, skill or artistic ability
word_etyma: geni出生，产生+us用→生出[就有]→天才
short_phrase: The boy genius has an idea.
sentence: The musical genius was a composer even in childhood.
sentence_trans: 音乐天才莫扎特小时候就是作曲家了。
